text: Koryo Celadon is a 1979 American short documentary film directed by Paul Raimondi about Goryeo dynasty pottery. It was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Short. It documents the manufacturing process of celadon vessels by Living National Treasure Yu Geun-Hyeong. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1979 films Category:1979 documentary films Category:1979 short films Category:American films Category:English-language films Category:American documentary films Category:Short documentary films Category:Documentary films about the visual arts Category:Korean pottery
title: Koryo Celadon
